name: do-task-backend
description: - DoTasks is a task manager, that lets you to easily add configure and manage tasks.  - Project is set up on Node.js backend and MongoDB database - Tasks can be grouped in folders, both tasks  and folders are draggable and can be moved all around. - Tasks can contain, lists, subtasks or files if needed. - Tasks can be scheduled, an email notification will be send to user if desired. - App is managed with Jira and tested with Jasmine.
author: kubasulek2 <kubasulek2@gmail.com>
